subject: Simsonn Plus X pedals
description_text:

conversations.body_text: Yes, you can purchase from our official website and enjoy a extra two-year warranty, so you can rest assured. What's more, you can use this special discount to enjoy a $35 discount: CNFRCS  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-plus-x-pedals
